text: nae(hananim)ga geudaedeul-eul palaoui chujongjadeullobuteo guhae jueoss-eum-eul gieoghala. geudeul-eun geudaedeul-i geugsimhan gonan-eul gyeokkdolog hayeoss-euni geudaedeul-ui adeuldeul-eun dosalhago geudaedeul-ui yeojadeul-eun sallyeo dudeola. geudaedeul junim-eulobuteoui hogdoghan siheom-i geogie iss-eossnola
